top_comments_top.body:
Hello and welcome to r/LifeProTips!

Please help us decide if this post is a good fit for the subreddit by up or downvoting this comment. 

If you think that this is great advice to improve your life, please upvote. If you think this doesn't help you in any way, please downvote. If you don't care, leave it for the others to decide.
Can confirm this works. I've had my wife as my phone's background for years.

Android Phones; Install [Simple Notepad](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.mightyfrog.android.simplenotepad), it has a widget that places 'sticky notes' on your desktop. These are resizable, customisable, and can include checkboxes to mark things off, like a shopping list.

I just set reminders on my phone and don’t close out the notification til I do it. Every time I wake my phone I see the reminder. Shoot sometimes I reset the time for the notification so it pings me again

Wait you guys have phones? /S

But this sounds like a neat idea for an app :)
